title: Sherman-Morrison Theorem: Formal Verification in Lean 4
description: A complete formal verification of the Sherman-Morrison theorem in Lean 4 with Mathlib. The Sherman-Morrison theorem provides an efficient formula for computing the inverse of a rank-one update to an invertible matrix. This formalization includes a constructive proof verified by the Lean 4 type checker, making it suitable for use in certified numerical algorithms and as a reference for formal verification of linear algebra theorems.
